name: Welcome to inflight Video - Please subscribe!
description:
inflight Video provide high quality video from onboard flights around the world. We have many full flight videos featuring the entire flight in real time, to soak up the entire flying experience without leaving your living room. 

Our Timelapse Series features full flights sped up to experience a complete flight in a few minutes. Alternatively, experience takeoffs and landings from around the world.

We hope you will enjoy our videos and subscribe to our Youtube channel to get regular new videos to enjoy.
#inflightVideo #FullFlight #FullFlightVideo
